metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6108 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the fsck_chk_orphan_node functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A specially crafted f2fs filesystem can cause a heap buffer overflow resulting in a code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
